title: Local Hour: SPICED UP WEDNESDAY!
description:
LET'S GET SPICY. Bacardi has sponsored Spiced Up Wednesdays here at the Le Batard Show, and Billy is ready to spice things up. Then, what would you do if you caught Aaron Judge's 62nd home run ball? Plus, we chat with new Panthers star Matthew Tkachuk about moving to Florida, the team's improvements, and invite him on his first trip to Flanigan's.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
